summary: Mint War Office clerk Alfas (canary) with minimal scopes and provenance.

directives.details: Draft RFC: intent, risks, exit criteria; include Order 025 metadata (owner/timestamp/approvals).
Define 'war_office_clerk' recipe with strict allowlists and rate limits.
Mint 2â€“3 canary clerks (clerk_b1, clerk_b2, optional clerk_b3) with manifests and build_info.

Send report to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-16-032-report.json with paths, counts, checksums, retention=7d, rollback.
